page.title: 09HOLME FARM
page.content: Holme Farm is an arable farm of 660 acres,with only a few cattle. Crops of vegetables,potatoes,barley and oil seed rape are grown in a 4 yearly rotation. Horses were used until 1940, but have now been replaced by 6 tractors. The farm is run by the farmer and three workers. Christmas trees are also grown as a seasonal cash crop. Cattle are bought and sold at Rugeley and Uttoxeter markets,while oil seed rape is sold at Wolverhampton. Summary The farms in the area are of two types,arable or dairy. It was noted that all the farms are large businesses,each covering a great deal of land. The introduction of machinery has reduced the work force in each case.
